name: The sea inside
description:
From the collection of “inside”

The sun rose and yawned. He said to himself, "This time I will shine for a few days." Then he rubbed his eyes and lifted himself up and looked around... The ground was yellower than yesterday and the trees less than before... the water was dry and the animals that were soaked in the sun yesterday were gone. The sound of human moaning bothered his ears. The sun bent down and went down... hungry children were staring at him... the sun went down... tired women and wounded men... went down... the sound of guns and bullets ...the smell of gunpowder and blood... he went down ... he was heartbroken and his yellow color was turning red... he said to himself "I cannot stand more than this!"... and he sank in the sea... .
